productName: DCP-L2531DW 3-in-1 Monochrome Laser Multi-Function Centre with Automatic 2-sided Printing and Wireless Networking
description:
A4 print speed up to 30 ppm (Black)
WiFi, AirPrint, Mopria, WiFi Direct, USB 2.0
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, 2-line LCD, 64 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 3000 pages (black)*
Compatible with Brother iPrint&Scan Mobile App** & BR Admin**
1 Year on-site warranty included
